content: I think I'll try adding some fresh parsley to the garlic mixture for extra flavor. I've been experimenting with different herbs and spices lately, and parsley is one of my new favorites. By the way, speaking of experimenting with new ingredients, I recently discovered a great Italian grocery store in my neighborhood that sells fresh pasta and authentic Italian ingredients. I picked up some fresh fettuccine and a jar of arrabbiata sauce, which I used to make a quick and easy dinner last Thursday. It turned out surprisingly well, and I've been thinking about going back to the store to explore more of their products.
